20110104154313.000|20110104154315.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.        
20110104154315.000|20110104154315.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20110104154315.000|20110104154318.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20110104154318.000|20110104154318.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20110104154318.000|20110104154321.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20110104154321.000|20110104154321.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20110104154321.000|20110104154324.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20110104154324.000|20110104154324.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20110104154324.000|20110104154324.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20110104154324.000|20110104154327.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20110104154327.000|20110104154327.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20110104154327.000|20110104154329.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20110104154329.000|20110104154329.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20110104154329.000|20110104154332.000|CC1|          thioridazine          
20110104154332.000|20110104154332.000|CC1| or with uncontrolled glaucoma  
20110104154332.000|20110104154335.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20110104154335.000|20110104154335.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain    
20110104154335.000|20110104154336.000|CC1|           relievers,           
20110104154336.000|20110104154336.000|CC1| aspirin, or blood thinners may 
20110104154336.000|20110104154339.000|CC1|    increase bleeding risk.     
20110104154339.000|20110104154339.000|CC1|  Severe liver problems, some   
20110104154339.000|20110104154341.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20110104154341.000|20110104154341.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20110104154341.000|20110104154344.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes. 
20110104154344.000|20110104154344.000|CC1|Talk with your doctor about your
20110104154344.000|20110104154346.000|CC1|           medicines,           
20110104154346.000|20110104154346.000|CC1|including those for migraine, or
20110104154346.000|20110104154349.000|CC1|    if you have high fever,     
20110104154349.000|20110104154350.000|CC1|  confusion and stiff muscles,  
20110104154350.000|20110104154350.000|CC1|     to address a possible      
20110104154350.000|20110104154352.000|CC1|  life-threatening condition.   
20110104154352.000|20110104154352.000|CC1| Tell your doctor about alcohol 
20110104154352.000|20110104154355.000|CC1|      use, liver disease,       
20110104154355.000|20110104154355.000|CC1| and before you reduce or stop  
20110104154355.000|20110104154357.000|CC1|        taking Cymbalta.        
20110104154357.000|20110104154357.000|CC1|Dizziness or fainting may occur 
20110104154357.000|20110104154359.000|CC1|         upon standing.         
20110104154359.000|20110104154359.000|CC1|Side effects include nausea, dry
20110104154359.000|20110104154403.000|CC1|    mouth, and constipation.
